Text:
Just downloaded the first 4 parts of this.
Perfect! 
Thx so much, Hitch is my hero.

Great to have it read in his voice too, you should consider putting together a torrent of his best interviews/speeches, etc.

I'm sure it would be really popular. There's a great interview on ABC's Late night Live (Australian Radio.

I love this ponce.
Hope he beats the big C.
Thanks so much for uploading this! I can never get enough of Hitchens, and I sincerely hope he survives his cancer, so that we can all continue to bask in the glory of his writings.

Nothing makes me happier than seeing fellow fans of this guy.

Thank you for the upload.
I'm so glad he managed to compose this before his death. We'll miss you.
Excellent audiobook and upload. Thank you.
I wish there were more like him around what a legend.
